mapper.select: SELECT 'row'||rownum rowname, (rownum - mod(rownum, 2) * 1.5 + 10) * 1 column1, (rownum - mod(rownum, 2) * 1.5 + 10) * 2 column2, (rownum - mod(rownum, 2) * 1.5 + 10) * 3 column3, (rownum - mod(rownum, 2) * 1.5 + 10) * 4 column4, (rownum - mod(rownum, 2) * 1.5 + 10) * 5 column5 FROM dual CONNECT BY level < 10
SELECT ename, job, nvl((select ename from emp where empno = e.mgr), '') mgr FROM emp e
